articles.title: Hu Jintao Invites Kim Jong Il to Visit
articles.content:
Hu Jintao Invites Kim Jong Il to Visit
 Pyongyang October 29 (KCNA) -- Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party and president of the People's Republic of China, met with the delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK on a visit to China, at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing on October 28.
					 Hu Jintao asked Choe Thae Bok to convey to General Secretary Kim Jong Il his invitation to visit China at a convenient time.
					
					 He said he was accorded cordial hospitality by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the party, the government and the people of the DPRK during his visit to the DPRK four years ago and recollected it with deep emotion.
					
					 The visit paid by the WPK delegation to China in the wake of the visit of Premier Wen Jiabao to the DPRK is an indication that Kim Jong Il and the party and the government of the DPRK attach utmost importance to the development of the relations between the two countries, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The traditional Sino-DPRK relations have been put on a new stage through celebrations and exchange and cooperation that took place this year on the occasions of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties and the "year of Sino-DPRK friendship."
					
					 It is unshakable strategic policy of the party and the government of China to further consolidate and develop the Sino-DPRK friendship provided by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries.
					
					 The party and the government of China are ready to strive with the Korean comrades to put the relations of friendship between the two countries on a new stage, defend regional peace and stability and achieve common development and prosperity by further expanding cooperation and visits in all fields in the spirit of "inheriting the tradition, facing up to the future, building good-neighborly friendship and strengthening cooperation" with utmost importance given to the Sino-DPRK relations.
					
					 He expressed belief that the fraternal Korean people would achieve greater success in building a great prosperous and powerful nation, united close around the WPK headed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The party, the government and the people of China will support the party, the government and the people of the DPRK in their cause of socialist construction in the future, too, he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Chongryon Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Chongryon Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk in a compatriotic atmosphere with the delegation of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) headed by Ko Tok U, vice-chairman of its Central Standing Committee, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Congratulates Kyrgyzstan PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Congratulates Kyrgyzstan PM
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Daniyar Usenov upon his appointment as prime minister of Kyrgyzstan.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms, the message wished him success in his future work.

articles.title: National Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held
articles.content:
National Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Work Held
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A national seminar took place at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday to deeply study and grasp the scientific accuracy, validity and great vitality of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science".
					The seminar heard six papers which deeply explained and proved Kim Jong Il's work. 
					
					Ryang Kyong Bok, director and editor-in-chief of the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House, said in his speech titled "The great leader Kim Jong Il's work  'Socialism Is a Science' serves as an immortal great programme indicating the road of winning the victory of socialism as it comprehensively systematizes and deals with the Juche-oriented theory of socialism" that the work is a perfect programme of socialism which comprehensively systematizes and deals with  the socialist theory centered on the popular masses, the theory of putting main emphasis on man. 
					
					Thae Hyong Chol, president of the Academy of Social Sciences, noted that the work has formulated socialism as the most just idea and a revolutionary banner for achieving independence and scientifically clarified that socialism is the idea chosen by the popular masses themselves.
					
					Song Ja Rip, president of Kim Il Sung University, in his speech made on the subject "Our socialism is the most scientific socialism based on the Juche-oriented view and stand on man" proved the reason why our socialism is the most scientific socialism, saying that how to view and approach man is an important issue related to the scientific accuracy and truth of a social system and its fate. 
					
					Pak Jong Won, deputy director of Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, made a speech on the subject "Our socialism is the most advantageous and powerful socialism centering on the popular masses".
					
					Kim Won Sok, deputy editor-in-chief of Rodong Sinmun noted that the benevolent politics pursued by President Kim Il Sung is being consistently carried forward by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The benevolent politics followed by the WPK is a main factor of defining the advantages and invincibility of the man-centered Korean style socialism and a great political mode providing a sure guarantee for an eternally rosy future of the DPRK, he added. 
					
					Kim Kwang Jom, secretary of the Primary Party Organization of University of National Economics in his speech noted it is a noble duty of the army and people of the DPRK to work miracles and perform feats in the ongoing general offensive for building a thriving nation, regarding the Juche-oriented socialist theory as their faith.  He called on all officials and other working people to become honorable victors in the drive for opening the gate to the thriving nation.

articles.title: Seminar on "UN Week of Disarmament" Held
articles.content:
Seminar on "UN Week of Disarmament" Held
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held at the Chollima Hall of Culture Thursday on the occasion of the "UN week of disarmament" (Oct. 24 to 30).
					Attending it were Paek Yong Ho, vice-chairman of the National Peace Committee of Korea, and members of the committee, researchers of the International Affairs Institute and the Disarmament and Peace Institute of the DPRK and figures of all social standings including social scientists.
					
					The seminar heard speeches made on a series of issues including the historical development of the movement for disarmament and its urgency, the issue of raising the function and role of the UN and the Geneva disarmament conference in dealing with the issue of disarmament, efficiency and limitations of international treaties and agreements on disarmament, the issue of disarmament at present, nuclear disarmament in particular, the issue of realizing a comprehensive and total elimination of nuclear weapons from the earth and the matter of ensuring peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					The speakers said that if the UN is to creditably perform its function and role in the field of disarmament it is necessary to reform its Security Council in a more democratic way and improve the activities of its first committee specializing in disarmament and the world's biggest nuclear weapons states should take the lead in materializing disarmament, nuclear disarmament in particular.
					
					It is important to hold in check the U.S. moves for building a missile shield as it may trigger off new arms race and put an end to the arms sale of the West including the U.S. as it is major source of worldwide conflict and escalated tension, they added.
					
					They underlined the need to force the hostile forces to roll back their policies of antagonizing the DPRK and remove their nuclear threat and pressurize the U.S. forces to pull back from south Korea and its vicinity, stop all forms of war exercises for aggression there and replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace accord in order to rid the Korean Peninsula of the danger of a war and realize disarmament and ensure peace and security there.

articles.title: Russian Embassies Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Russian Embassies Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials did friendship work at the DPRK-Russia Friendship Kochang Cooperative Farm in Chollima County, South Phyongan Province on Thursday.
					 They helped farmers in thrashing rice.
					
					 The guests handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Promising Wrestler
articles.content:
Promising Wrestler
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- A DPRK wrestler won a gold medal in the World Wrestling Championship held in Denmark some time ago.
					He is 22-year-old Yang Kyong Il of the sports team of Kim Il Sung University who defeated all the rivals on overwhelming points at the 55kg category freestyle event. 
					
					When he was young, he, encouraged by his parents, sports fans, joined the football circle of the Sosong District Juvenile Physical Training School in Pyongyang. 
					
					It was at the age of 11 when he began learning wrestling.
					
					He became a boy wrestling ace when he was 12 years old and took part in the A-class contest from the age of 18.
					
					His forte is good physical condition, accurate judgment, swift reaction and skilful application of any techniques including leg-hold and body throw under any situation.
					
					He won gold medals at the 46kg category event of the Sakha international contest held in Russia and 55kg category event qualifying for the 29th Olympic Games and a silver medal in the 55kg category event of the Asian Wrestling Championship held in Thailand in May this year.
					
					His holding the world championship gives a new confidence and vitality to the Korean wrestlers. 
					
					It is expected that he will prove successful in international contests including the 2012 London Olympic Games.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Roentgen Factory
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Roentgen Factory
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Much effort has been channelled into development of advanced medical instruments in the DPRK.
					The Mangyongdae Roentgen Factory has made successes in applying the latest science and technology to diagnostic facilities including abdomen ultrasonograph, electroencephalograph and electromyograph, while newly inventing highly efficient medical appliances.
					
					The successful clinical test of the electrocardiograph opened a bright vista for its production.
					
					And they completed a search unit of the abdomen ultrasonograph, which is the main element in screening pictures of the internal organs and diagnosing them.
					
					In addition, the factory is pushing ahead with the work for upgrading production processes of new medical instruments.
					
					Other medical instrument production units in different parts of the country are also striving hard to develop up-to-date facilities for promotion of people's health.

articles.title: Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations Brooks not Delay
articles.content:
Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations Brooks not Delay
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- To improve the inter-Korean relations is an urgent task whose fulfillment brooks not a moment's delay, observes Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a signed article.
					It goes on: 
					
					Independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the Korean nation would be unthinkable without the improvement of the inter-Korean relations. The DPRK remains consistent in its stand to achieve national reunification through reconciliation and unity of the nation.
					
					It is impossible to successfully implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration unless the ongoing confrontation between the north and the south is terminated as the situation surrounding the Korean Peninsula remains tenser and more complicated than ever before, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					Only when the confrontation between the north and the south is brought to an end is it possible to defuse the military tension and achieve national reconciliation and unity. If the inter-Korean relations turn into those of confidence and reconciliation from those of mistrust and confrontation, there will be an atmosphere favorable for national reconciliation and cooperation.
					
					The Koreans should not allow under any circumstances any foreign force's attempt to interfere in the issue of the inter-Korean relations and realize its aggressive and hegemonic ambition. They are fully capable of solving their issues by themselves as required by their will and wishes and this was proved in practice in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					Any attempt to shun from the undertaking to improve the inter-Korean relations and shelve it cannot be construed otherwise than an artifice to perpetuate the national division and pursue the confrontation between the north and the south. This practice will leave an indelible stain on the history of the nation after being branded as treachery. 
					
					All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should give momentum to the atmosphere of reconciliation and inject fresh energy into the movement for reunification and thus put further spurs to the process to improve the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Developing Countries Called upon to Promote Scientific and Technical Development
articles.content:
Developing Countries Called upon to Promote Scientific and Technical Development
Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Science and technology provide developing countries with a sure guarantee for putting spurs to the independent development and national prosperity in the new century. Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in a signed article.
					Noting that developing countries are required to reach a high level of scientific and technological development as early as possible, the article stresses one of the ways to do so is to develop science and technology by their own strength and efforts.
					
					They have potentials, possibilities and conditions to develop science and technology, the article says, and continues:
					
					It is the only way of developing science and technology to work hard to do so from the Juche-oriented stand. 
					
					What is important in this respect is to prevent the brain drain.  
					
					It is necessary to pay special attention to the work to help the scientists and technicians deeply cherish the spirit of national independence and patriotism. 
					
					Developing countries are sure to achieve signal successes if they attach importance to the role played by the scientists and technicians in achieving the independent development and national prosperity of the country and direct big efforts to training excellent scientists and technicians. 
					
					They can train many able scientists and technicians by rounding off their educational systems and raising the quality of education.
					
					It is one of the urgent tasks facing developing countries at present to give full play to the spirit of collective self-reliance in the field of science and technology and boost South-South cooperation.
					
					They can achieve rapid progress in science and technology without spending a lot of money if they boost the cooperation and exchange in such a way that encourages every country to transfer its advanced science and technology to other country and each country to apply new science and technology on the principle of mutual accommodation. 
					
					It is an important way of developing science and technology for developing countries to steadily develop cooperation and exchange among the scientists and technicians and help one another in training them.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Marked in Different Countries
Pyongyang October 29 (KCNA) -- A DPRK book and photo exhibition and a film show were held in Russia and ceremonies of opening DPRK book, photo and handicraft exhibitions in Mexico and Bulgaria between Oct. 9 and 19 to mark the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 83rd formation anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					Displayed in the venues of the events were works of the peerlessly great persons and photos on their undying exploits, photos on the Korean people in the efforts to build a thriving socialist nation and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean nation.
					
					Speeches were made at the opening ceremonies of exhibitions.
					
					The chairman of the National Committee of the Radio and TV Broadcasting Reporters' Association of Mexico praised the 64 year-long history of the WPK which has led the Korean people along the road of victory and glory.
					
					He said: We express admiration for the outstanding leadership ability and revolutionary faith of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and wish only victory and glory to the WPK and the Korean people.
					
					 The deputy mayor of Velingrad of Bulgaria said that the Velingrad citizens still remember the exploit performed by President Kim Il Sung for the development of the friendly and cooperative relations between Bulgaria and the DPRK. And he expressed conviction that the exhibition would show the high cultural level and development of the Korean people and contribute to developing the bilateral friendly relations.
					
					 Appreciated at the film show was a Korean film dealing with evening of "Fireworks for Building Great, Prosperous and Powerful Nation".

articles.title: Mexican Institute Release Bulletin
articles.content:
Mexican Institute Release Bulletin
 Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea released the 45th issue of its bulletin "Traditional fighting spirit of Korean people" on the occasions of the 64th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 83rd anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The bulletin in an article noted that the U.S. and other imperialist forces are leaving no means untried to bring down socialist Korea, but the people of the DPRK remain unshaken.
					
					The society of the DPRK is pervaded with the spirit of single-minded unity, the bulletin said, adding that the army and the people of the DPRK are united as firm as a rock around General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il on the basis of the monolithic idea, faith and comradeship and the sense of moral obligation.
					
					The single-minded unity of the society of the DPRK provides a sure guarantee for all the victories of its people as it is the most powerful and solid unity which can hardly be found in any other country of the world and remains unbreakable, the bulletin noted, and continued: 
					
					Whenever they found themselves in a grim situation decisive of the destiny of the country and the nation the Korean revolutionaries weathered difficulties with indomitable faith and will and staunch spirit of offensive, turning adversity into a favorable situation and misfortune into blessing. 
					
					The Korean people have fully embodied the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance. This spirit is the traditional fighting spirit fully displayed in the course of the protracted Korean revolution.
					
					The bulletin carried photos showing the launching of satellites "Kwangmyongsong-1" and "Kwangmyongsong-2".

articles.title: Hu Jintao se reune con delegacion del PTC
articles.content:
Hu Jintao se reune con delegacion del PTC
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ATCC) -- Hu Jintao, secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y presidente de la Republica Popular China, se reunio el dia 28 en el Gran Palacio del Pueblo en Beijing con la delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC) encabezada por el secretario Choe Thae Bok, de visita en China. 
					En la ocasion Hu Jintao rogo al visitante que transmitiera al Dirigente Kim Jong Il que le invita visitar a China en el periodo favorable.
					
					Diciendo que durante la visita a Corea realizada hace 4 anos fue objeto de cordial hospitalidad del Secretario General Kim Jong Il, el partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Corea, recordo con gran emocion al respecto.
					
					Senalo  que la visita de la delegacion del PTC a China, que se realiza despues del viaje del premier Wen Jiabao a Corea, demuestra que el Secretario General Kim Jong Il, el partido y el gobierno de Corea dan la maxima importancia al desarrollo de las relaciones de ambos paises y prosiguio: 
					
					A traves de las festividades, intercambio y cooperacion efectuados en este ano con motivo del 60o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas y del "Ano de Amistad China-Corea", las tradicionales relaciones entre los dos paises se situaron en una nueva etapa.
					
					Consolidar mas la amistad China-Corea preparada por los dirigentes de la generacion veterana de ambos paises es la firme e invariable orientacion estrategica del partido y el gobierno de China.
					
					El partido y el gobierno de China dan la suma importancia a las relaciones China-Corea y tienen la voluntad de esforzarse junto con los camaradas coreanos por desarrollar a nueva etapa estas relaciones de amistad, defender la paz y la estabilidad de la region y para lograr el desarrollo y prosperidad comunes mediante la ampliacion mayor de la cooperacion y viajes en todos los sectores segun el espiritu de la "sucesion de tradicion, aspiracion al futuro, buena vecindad y amistad, fortalecimiento de cooperacion".
					
					Estoy convencido de que el hermano pueblo coreano unido firmemente en torno al PTC encabezado por el Secretario General Kim Jong Il lograra mayores exitos en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					El partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de China apoyaran tambien en el futuro la causa de la construccion del socialismo del partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Corea.

articles.title: Seminario sobre obra de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Seminario sobre obra de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 29 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el seminario nacional para asimilar la cientificidad, la justeza y la gran vitalidad de la obra del Dirigente           Kim Jong Il "El socialismo es ciencia".
					En la ocasion fueron publicadas 6 disertaciones  que explicaron y argumentaron con profundidad la citada obra.
					
					En su intervencion intitulada "La obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il 'El socialismo es ciencia' es gran  programa inmortal que aclaro el camino del triunfo del socialismo sistematizando y sintetizando de mantera global la autoctona teoria del socialismo",  Ryang Kyong Bok, director y redactor en jefe de la Editora del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, enfatizo que esta obra deviene el perfecto programa socialista que sistematizo y compilo de manera global la teoria del socialismo centrada en el hombre y en las masas populares.
					
					Thae Hyong Chol, presidente de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales, menciono que la obra en cuestion formulo el socialismo como ideal mas justo y bandera revolucionaria para realizar la independencia y aclaro de manera cientifica que el socialismo es el ideal escogido por las mismas masas populares.
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra bajo el titulo de "El nuestro es el socialismo mas cientifico basado en el punto de vista y posicion originales sobre el hombre", Song Ja Rip, rector de la Universidad
						 Kim Il Sung, dijo que la concepcion y la posicion con respecto al hombre devienen el problema importante relacionado con la cientificidad, veracidad y destino del regimen social y argumento la causa por la cual nuestro socialismo deviene el mas cientifico.
					
					Pak Jong Won, subdirector de la Escuela Superior del Partido Kim Il Sung, intervino con el titulo de "El socialismo de nuestro pais es el mas ventajoso y poderoso centrado en las masas populares".
					
					Kim Won Sok, subeditor jefe de la Editora del Periodico Rodong Sinmun, dijo que hoy, la politica de beneficios populares, que comenzo a practicar el Presidente Kim Il Sung, la lleva adelante invariablemente el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Subrayo que esa politica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea deviene el factor fundamental que determina la superioridad y la invencibilidad del socialismo coreano centrado en las masas populares y el gran modo politico que garantiza firmemente el eterno y maravilloso futuro de la patria.
					
					Kim Kwang Jom, secretario del comite de base del partido en la Universidad de Economia Nacional, senalo que el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea tienen el sublime deber de crear el prodigio y las proezas en la ofensiva general de hoy por la construccion de una gran potencia prospera tomando como su conviccion la original teoria socialista.
					
					Continuo que todos los funcionarios y trabajadores deberan ser triunfadores honorables en la lucha por abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera.

articles.title: Se abre simposio dedicado a la "semana de desarme de la ONU"
articles.content:
Se abre simposio dedicado a la "semana de desarme de la ONU"
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 29 en la Casa Cultural Chollima el simposio dedicado a la "semana de desarme de la ONU" (del dia 24 al 30).
					En la ocasion participaron el vicepresidente Paek Yong Ho y otros miembros del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz, los investigadores del Instituto de Asuntos Internacionales y del Instituto de Desarme y Paz y las personalidades del sector de ciencias sociales y otras ramas.
					
					En el foro fueron discutidos una serie de problemas como el curso historico y el caracter urgente del movimiento por el desarme, la elevacion de las funciones y papel de las conferencias en la ONU y en Ginebra por el particular, la eficiencia  y limitaciones de los tratados y convenios internacionales sobre el desarme.
					
					Igualmente, fueron tratados los problemas para  el desarme en la actualidad, especialmente, la reduccion de armas nucleares y la eliminacion total de estos artefactos de la faz de la Tierra y el de preservar la paz y la seguridad del Nordeste Asiatico incluyendo la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que la ONU debe reformar de modo mas democratico el Consejo de Seguridad e intensificar las actividades de su primera comision especializada en los asuntos de desarme para cumplir satisfactoriamente su funcion y papel en este tema.
					
					Prosiguieron que los paises, que poseen mayor numero de armas nucleares en el mundo, deben tomar la delantera en el desarme, particularmente, en el nuclear.
					
					Enfatizaron que hay que frenar las maquinaciones de EE.UU. dirigidas a establecer el sistema antimisiles, que buscan la nueva carrera armamentista, y poner fin al trafico de armas por parte de EE.UU. y otros paises occidentales que constituye el factor principal de exacerbacion de conflictos y tension en la palestra mundial.
					
					Para eliminar el peligro de guerra, realizar el desarme y preservar la paz y la seguridad en la Peninsula Coreana, se debe cancelar la politica hostil de las fuerzas hostiles a Corea y disipar la amenaza nuclear, apuntaron.
					
					Ademas, es preciso hacer retirarse a las tropas norteamericanas del suelo surcoreano y su contorno, poner fin a sus agresivas maniobras belicas de todo tipo y sustituir el Acuerdo de Armisticio con el tratado de paz, subrayaron.

articles.title: Mejora de relaciones Norte-Sur es la inminente tarea nacional
articles.content:
Mejora de relaciones Norte-Sur es la inminente tarea nacional
Pyongyang, 29 de octubre (ATCC) -- La mejora de las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea es la tarea inminente que no se puede postergar por mas tiempo. 
					Senala el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este jueves y prosigue: 
					
					Al margen de la mejora de los vinculos intercoreanos, la nacion coreana no puede imaginar la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad. 
					
					Tenemos la inflexible posicion de lograr la reunificacion de la patria mediante la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion. 
					
					En la actualidad se torna mas que nunca aguda y complicada la situacion en torno a la Peninsula Coreana. Por lo tanto, sin poner fin a la confrontacion Norte-Sur, no es posible ejecutar con exito la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					Solo cuando se alivie la confrontacion Norte-Sur, sera posible eliminar la tension militar y alcanzar la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales. 
					
					Si las relaciones intercoreanas de desconfianza y confrontacion se convierten en las de confianza y reconciliacion, se creara un ambiente favorable a la reconciliacion y cooperacion nacionales. 
					
					La nacion coreana no debe permitir jamas cualquier intencion de intervenir en los asuntos de las relaciones Norte-Sur y de realizar la ambicion agresiva y dominacionista. 
					
					Nuestra nacion tiene la suficiente capacidad de solucionar con sus propias fuerzas los problemas suyos de acuerdo con la voluntad y la demanda de si misma, lo cual fue confirmado en la practica de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio. 
					
					Dar espaldas a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y postergarla es una intencion de perpetuar la division nacional y perseguir la confrontacion fratricida, lo cual se calificara de traicion a la patria y dejara deshonra en la historia nacional. 
					
					Todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben alzar el clima de reconciliacion y activar el movimiento por la reunificacion para promover energicamente el desarrollo de las relaciones intercoreanas.
